quest_desc.qdesc: 1. 검은 대군주의 연병장 보스맵에서 (이전 퀘스트에 이어) 제레인트와 대화. 2. 세인트 헤이븐 왕성 비밀구역으로 입장. 3. 제레인트와 대화. 4. 아르젠타와 대화.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Geraint$
Come to the Royal Castle's underground in Saint Haven.

$Argenta$
You are susposed to know what to do after what Geraint talked to you?
Why are you still asking me?

$Geraint$
...
(I seems like he is too engross in his work that he do not know what going on around him. Go to Bishop Ignacio.)
<html></html>

$General Douglas$
Mmm... I heard the Prophet is still asleep. How could she do that? We did our best to save her but she not doing any thing now. Why not let hand her over to the king and let him take care of her

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I heard the girl, Prophet is still asleep, am I right? Expect this to happen and she is such a useless girl and everyone still waiting for her because she is the prophet

$King Cassius$
I highly value your contributions for saving the Prophet. But I was both surprise and disappointed by her being a country girl and directly went to sleep without greeting me. *Sob*.

$Duke Stuart$
I was wondering about the Prophet's appearance, never did I expect her to be an ordinally lonely looking girl. Anyway you done a great job

$Bishop Ignacio$
Hey you are here. That was quite a truly hard-fought battle right.
I can tell by just looking at you.

$Geraint$
Come to the Royal Castle's underground in Saint Haven.

$Argenta$
You are susposed to know what to do after what Geraint talked to you?
Why are you still asking me?

$King Cassius$
I highly value your contributions for saving the Prophet. But I was both surprise and disappointed by her being a country girl and directly went to sleep without greeting me. *Sob*.

$Duke Stuart$
I was wondering about the Prophet's appearance, never did I expect her to be an ordinally lonely looking girl. Anyway you done a great job

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I heard the girl, Prophet is still asleep, am I right? Expect this to happen and she is such a useless girl and everyone still waiting for her because she is the prophet

$General Douglas$
Mmm... I heard the Prophet is still asleep. How could she do that? We did our best to save her but she not doing any thing now. Why not let hand her over to the king and let him take care of her

$Bishop Ignacio$
But why is it that you haven't brought the Prophet back here?
What? Geraint has her?
(You must go to the Royal Castle Secret Region to meet Geraint.)

$Geraint$
...
(I seems like he is too engross in his work that he do not know what going on around him. Go to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Argenta$
You are susposed to know what to do after what Geraint talked to you?
Why are you still asking me?

$Argenta$
... That Geraint is really doing a useless thing.
(Argenta grumbles and looks towards Geraint .)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Did you create a Nest at this place?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
The descendant of the Ancients is at the center of the Dragon Nest.

$Geraint$
That's right. The center of the Nest is the sanctuary. It is a forbidden for anyone except the owner
It was also the best thing to safeguard the descendents of the Ancients now.

$Geraint$
I yet to recovered fully and planned to stay here for awhile. But it seems like Argenta is leaving soon and she wish to say goodbye to you, go look for her now

$Geraint$
To completely destroy the Nest, the owner of the Nest had to be defeated. I would be able to block off intruder even if the barrier is weak

$Argenta$
That Geraint. He is really such a useless person
He's always looking for trouble in different ways!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh my, but that's a little too...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Look at that fool. He is injured yet he dare to say he is staying here for the sake of the descendant of the Ancients. And he could have probably healed his wounds if he just swallowed her up.

$Argenta$
He seem determined to protect, so I have nothing more to say.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you talking about 50years old period when you mention about the old days?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Since the old days, I can believe anyone except for Geraint but he just believed what everyone had said
Even during that period, the fait of his nearly ruined everythign that going to be completed.

$Argenta$
Yes. Initially Geraint and me came to Saint Haven to defeat the Black Dragon but Geraint doubt so thus.
He gathered up colleagues.

$Argenta$
Six or Ten heroes it doesn't matter as they brought along a huge amount of backup.
There were groups of Sorceresses and archers. How annoying.

$Argenta$
Just when we thought we had defeated the Black Dragon and even destroyed his body and succeeded at taking out the Jewel.
But then, Velskud snatched it away.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then what happened to the Black Dragon this time?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Velskud soon disappeard with the Jewel. We had nearly defeated the Black Dragon, but it was the worst... Geraint and I both could not move for a while because of our injuries.

$Argenta$
A human will never become a dragon even with the Dragon's Jewel thus he seek help form the ancient in the hope to become a real dragon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you saying that the Ancients have created the Black Dragon?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
That's right. He obtained powers from the Ancient child, and has become the Black Dragon. Yet he was weaker than the Black Dragon from 50 years ago. Of course, the Black Dragon back then was formed from a bunch of different Ancients, so we can't really compare the two.

$Argenta$
You had a lot of question which I do not know. I have no intention to continue this guardian thing
I also have nothing to do here anymore.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you mean Karacule, who is one of the Six Heroes...?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I'm going to go meet Karacule.
I going to help find a way to cure Geraint even thou I am injured

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't worry. I'll will take care of Geraint.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Is that noisy Sorceress also a hero or whatever? Well, if you say so. Well, I'll be heading towards Lotus Marsh.
{user_nick}, weakling, don't do anything stupid, and just quietly wait with Geraint.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I never know she could smile with such a sweet face)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argent$
Ha ha ha... So who's going to look after who. A injured person like you worried about somebody else
I really can't understand you sometimes. Haha.

journal.title: Going to the Secret Region
journal.contents:
Injured Geraint told you that he will take Rose. He asked us to go Secret Region. Let's go

Saint Haven(Underground Secret Region) → Geraint
journal.destination: Going to Royal Castle Underground Secret Region.

journal.title: Argenta's Farewell
journal.contents:
Geraint had created the Nest in Saint Haven to protect Rose. Argenta is about to go to different place so say goodbye to her.

Saint Haven(Underground Secret Region) → Argenta
